entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Orangeville

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
